promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic gecko fighting-type pokemon holding a rocky dagger. It can be found in ruins-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or gecko. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Stoniklaw, a a chibi cute basic gecko fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in ruins-like environments It has the following abilities: Rock Tackle. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gecko", "fighting" or "Stoniklaw". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, gecko-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This petite yet spunky critter delights in ancient ruins. With Rock Tackle, Stoniklaw elegantly carves its home into stone walls.
